code:
const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5001';// Function to get the full URL for images and files
export const getFileUrl=filePath=>{if(!filePath)return'';// If it's already a full URL, return as is
if(filePath.startsWith('http://')||filePath.startsWith('https://')){return filePath;}// If it starts with /, it's a relative path, prepend the API URL
if(filePath.startsWith('/')){return"".concat(API_URL).concat(filePath);}// Otherwise, assume it's a relative path and prepend the API URL with /
return"".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(filePath);};export default API_URL;
